snippet.title: Periphery Synthetic Accessibility Trailer - Access-Ability Summer Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Explore a planetary system, synthesize new abilities, and reveal its past. This interactive EP offers a chill and non-violent metroidvania experience across procedurally-generated musical playgrounds. 

Playable via audio cues without sighted assistance.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121790/Periphery_Synthetic/
